biography.title: About Mark A. Fitch
biography.p: Do you really want to know anything.

acknowledgement.p: This problem set has been developed with the assistance of many students from Introduction to Geometries at the University of Alaska Anchorage.

preface.p: This text is intended for a one semester geometries course taught using inquiry based learning.
